text.en: Build a fishing robot and position it at the start line. Throw 20 pieces of CP1x1 beams (fish) within the circle in the middle of the challenge field (pond). Your task is to get 10 pieces of fish in each of the two cups placed on the purple and blue circles. Be careful not to step in the pond.

Start from the start line.
Do not step inside the pond.
Try to be as fast as possible.
You have got 3 trials.

You finished within 15 minutes. = Good job! Let's try again.
You finished within 10 minutes. = Wow! Excellent job! Another try?
You finished within 5 minutes. = You are such a pro!
Bonus task: Can you do the same by programming your robot?

Let's count your points.
Finished within 15 minutes. = 5 points
Finished within 10 minutes. = 10 points
Finished within 5 minutes. = 15 points
We would love to see your scores.
